title: Comment: Pixel 6 delayed updates chip away at Google’s ‘flagship’ experience
content:
It probably doesn’t need to be said, but the delayed update schedule for the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro not only hurts those of us that value prompt support. It cheapens and chips away at the perceived “flagship” experience being sold to prospective buyers.

more…

The post Comment: Pixel 6 delayed updates chip away at Google’s ‘flagship’ experience appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The recent issues with delayed Pixel 6 and 6 Pro updates is severely hampering the duo and devaluing Google's flagship Android smartphones.
